price: ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߓߊ߲߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߓߏ߲߫ ߖߟߐ߬ߞߐ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߖߊ߲߬ߧߊ ߦߋ߫ ߣߐ߲߬ߞߐ߲ ߢߊ߫ ߓߌߥߐߙߐ߲ߥߌ߬ߟߊ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: ثُمَّ فِي سِلۡسِلَةٖ ذَرۡعُهَا سَبۡعُونَ ذِرَاعٗا فَٱسۡلُكُوهُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: thumma fī sil'silatin dharʿuhā sabʿūna dhirāʿan fa-us'lukūhu
